publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 27
ab.l:
David́niń miźmor H jaryḥlyɣym da
jarlyɣašym kimd́ań qorḥarmyn H ḱuč́u tirlikĺarimniń kimd́an śoźḱanir- miń.
Juvuɣanda üśt́uḿa jaman et́uv́č́uĺar tavusma gufumnu tar b́eŕuv́č́uĺarim da dušmanlarym ḿenim alar śuŕuńurĺar da jyɣy- lyrlar.
Eger toḥtasa üśt́uḿa avul qorḥmejdyr juŕagim e- ger tursa üśt́uḿa č́eriv́ bunun byla ḿeń emińdir.
Bir kĺak klejmiń H-dan any qolamyn ki bolgej ulturušum juv́uńd́a H-nyn bar t́erlik ḱuńĺarimd́a ḱorḿa hašɣaḥasyn H-nyn da ert́a turup maḥtav b́erḿa sarajynda.
Ki astrar ḿeni alačyɣynda jaman vaḥtta jašyryr ḿeni syjynčynda čatyrynyn qajadan bijikŕak et́ar ḿeni.
Da haĺegińa ḱot́u- ŕur bašymny dušmanlarym üśt́uńa č́uv́ŕaĺarimd́a da d́ebaḥa et́ar- miń čatyrynda d́eb́eḥalaryn qyčḥyrmaḥnyn šira oḥurmyn da zemer oḥurmyn H-ɣa.
Ešit́kiń e H avazymny čaɣyramyn saja ḥajyfsunɣun da qaruv b́ergiń maja.
Śeniń üč́uń ajtadyr juŕagim qolujuz hašɣaḥasyn qyblalaryjny e H iźlejmiń.
Jašyrmaɣyn qyblalaryjny ḿeńd́ań qajyrylmaɣyn ačuv byla quluja bolušluɣum bolɣun tašlamaɣyn da kemišḿagiń ḿeni jarlyɣašly Teńrim.
Ki atam da anam kemištiĺar ḿeni vaĺe H yštyryr ḿeni.
Üv́ŕat́kiń maja e H jolujnu da ḱońd́argiń ḿeni t́uź iź byla jaman ḱoź byla baɣuvču- larym üč́uń.
B́erḿegiń ḿeni kĺagič́a tar b́eŕuv́č́uĺarimniń ki tur- dular ḿenim üč́uń jalɣan tanyḥlar da śoźlejdirĺar avanlyḥny.
Vaĺe inanamyn ḱorḿa hašɣaḥasyn H-nyn tirlik jerd́a.

Išanɣyn H-ɣa kipĺańgiń
da ḱučajsiń juŕagij da išanɣyn H-ɣa.

app.note: It should be olturuš ʻdwelling placeʼ (KRPS 427).
